Direct-TO | November 2017 <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/services/aerospace-services/godirect-flight-bag-pro]]> Inside the IRS <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2017/Nov2017/IRS3Nov17]]> <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2017/Aug2017/IRS1Aug17]]>
A Pilot’s Guide to Inertial Reference Systems, Part Three
Part Three of this series on the IRS will discuss the Hybrid IRS and Kalman Filters.... Read more <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2017/Nov2017/IRS3Nov17]]>
Data Link Overview <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2017/Nov2017/DataLinkNov17]]> Part Two, CPDLC
CPDLC is a means of communication between air traffic controller and pilot, using data link for ATC communications in lieu of VHF or HF voice radios... Read more <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2017/Nov2017/DataLinkNov17]]> Primus® Apex <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2017/Nov2017/Apex11Nov17]]> Build 11 Now Available
Primus Apex® Build 11 is now released and on its way to customers.... Read more <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2017/Nov2017/Apex11Nov17]]>
PC-12 NG <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2017/Nov2017/PC12ADSBNov17]]> ADS-B Transponder Exchange Now Available
Customers with the KXP 2290 non-ADS-B Transponder now have the option to utilize this SPEX program to upgrade to the ADS-B Transponder... Read more <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2017/Nov2017/PC12ADSBNov17]]>
US Data Comm Update <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2017/Nov2017/DatacommNov17]]>
FANS in the US – What’s Coming Next
The US Data Comm program uses the existing capability of FANS data link to provide data communications between ATC and pilots... Read more <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2017/Nov2017/DatacommNov17]]>
